title: S&P 500 Notches Fresh Record With Rotation Trade Gathering Pace
description: US stocks closed at an all-time high Tuesday, led by advances in materials, industrials and financials as a market rotation into laggards gained traction.
content: US stocks closed at an all-time high Tuesday, led by advances in materials, industrials and financials as a market rotation into laggards gained traction.
